The weather forecast for the match is overcast with a temperature of 28°C.
The pitch is expected to be batting-friendly with an average first innings score of 270, suitable for both pace and spin.
In the 65 matches played between these 2 teams, batters of both teams have earned the most fantasy points for their respective teams so far.
Sri Lanka and West Indies will lock horns in the 2nd ODI of West Indies tour of Sri Lanka 2024 on Wednesday, 23 October 2024, at Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium, Dambulla.

Predicted playing XI for West Indies includes Brandon King, Alick Athanaze, Shai Hope (WK/C), Keacy Carty, Roston Chase, Sherfane Rutherford, Romario Shepherd, Gudakesh Motie, Hayden Walsh, Jayden Seales, and Alzarri Joseph.

Sri Lanka will be up against the West Indies in the 2nd match of the West Indies in Sri Lanka, 3 ODI Series, 2024. The match will be played at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy on 23rd October 2024 at 02:30 PM IST.

Temperature is expected to be around 25.74 °C with 84% humidity. 1.97 m/s winds are expected. Cloud cover expected, so expect some movement to aid the pace bowlers. There is moderate rain expected which may affect playing conditions.

Predicted playing XI for Sri Lanka includes Nishan Madushka, Avishka Fernando, Kusal Mendis (WK), Kamindu Mendis, Charith Asalanka, Sadeera Samarawickrama, Janith Liyanage, Wanindu Hasaranga, Dunith Wellalage, Jeffrey Vandersay, and Asitha Fernando.

In the first game of this series, Charith Asalanka was the Man of the Match and scored the highest fantasy points for Sri Lanka with 126 match fantasy points while Gudakesh Motie topped the fantasy points leaderboard for West Indies with 95 match fantasy points.

The pitch at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy will allow for good stroke play and the batters will find it easy to bat on the surface. The surface will not allow a lot of assistance to the bowlers and wicket taking is going to be difficult. The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 228 runs. The team winning the toss should look to bowl first as the majority of the games played on this ground have been won by the chasing side.
